name: Battle Royale (Brady612)
description:
Battle Instructions WASD to move, SPACE key or click to shoot, Mouse Pointer to aim, Number Keys to switch slots, R to reload, E to pick up items and consumables.

**Fullscreen HIGHLY Recommended**
Earn V-Bucks by getting Victory Royales, Use these V-Bucks to buy Backblings, Skins, and Lobby Musics. 
To save your progress go to Career and click Save!
Item shop resets every Midnight
